import React, { Component } from 'react' import Layout from "./Layout"; import { urlOfImages } from "./images"; import fetch from 'isomorphic-fetch'; class QueryWithAns extends Component{ constructor() { super(); this.state = { question :{}, answers : [] } } componentDidMount() { fetch('http://localhost:8000/questions/5e318a8bdcffd56170532100') .then(response => response.json()) .then((res)=>{ console.log(res.question); console.log(res.question.answers); this.setState({question : res.question, answers : res.question.answers}); }) } renderAnswer(){ console.log(`this is the answer array `); console.log(this.state.answers); this.state.answers.map((ans)=>console.log(ans.answer)); return ( <>{this.state.answers.map((answer)=>{
{answer.answer}
-- {answer.author.name}
})} ); } render(){ return(
